channel.title: Commands help
channel.description:
Guys i need your help badly on the commands i need to add the following
::pkinfo-Tells your deaths kills and pk points ::resetdef-Resets your defence but u need 250million ::quests-to do the quests for you because there is no way of doing quests in this source :( I also need help with
Adding pvp drops Adding more items to the pkpoint shop Changing the coords of shops but takeing the shops with me so i dont have to start them again
Please help me with this 1 i have only just started programming

item.title: Commands help
item.dc:creator: @coocoobanana coocoobanana
item.description:
@coocoobanana wrote:

Guys i need your help badly on the commands i need to add the following

::pkinfo-Tells your deaths kills and pk points
::resetdef-Resets your defence but u need 250million
::quests-to do the quests for you because there is no way of doing quests in this source
I also need help with

Adding pvp drops
Adding more items to the pkpoint shop
Changing the coords of shops but takeing the shops with me so i dont have to start them again

Please help me with this 1 i have only just started programming

Read full topic
